snippet: The Yankees have been desperate for a dangerous right-handed bat. Only recently rushed back from an injury, Alex Rodriguez homered in an 8-5 victory over the Orioles.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees have been desperate for a dangerous right-handed bat. Only recently rushed back from an injury, Alex Rodriguez homered in an 8-5 victory over the Orioles.

headline.seo: Rodriguez Finds His Old Stroke, Which Yankees Have Been Missing
headline.main: Rodriguez Finds His Old Stroke, Which Yankees Have Been Missing
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Finds His Old Stroke, Which Yankees Have Been Missing
